item.title: CVE-2022-27496|2024-08-03T05:32:57.864Z -- zero-channel%20bbs%20plus%20developers -- zero-channel%20bbs%20plus
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Zero-channel BBS Plus v0.7.4 and earlier allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
